HIPAA.name: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act
HIPAA.description: US healthcare data protection requiring encryption of PHI

PCI-DSS.name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
PCI-DSS.description: Standard for organizations handling credit card information

GDPR.name: General Data Protection Regulation
GDPR.description: EU regulation requiring strong encryption for personal data

FIPS-140-2.name: Federal Information Processing Standard
FIPS-140-2.description: US government standard for cryptographic modules
